website_summaries.verdict: A trusted and dependable performance continues to be the main offering of the 8th iteration of the Gel Pulse. The shoe has excellent comfort, decent arch support, adequate cushioning, and ultra-breathable coverage that should make this a very ideal for runners of all levels, particularly beginners or middle of the pack road enthusiasts.
pros: A very comfortable ride is for the taking in the Gel Pulse 8, according to many of the reviews
Some of the reviewers consider the shoe’s price as very reasonable
A handful noticed that it runs quite light
There are several who have used it for gym workouts and other cardiovascular exercises to great effect
The open mesh upper guarantees a very breathable ride
Quite a few noted that their runs were effortless
cons: A small number of users disliked the shoe’s traction on wet surfaces
It is a bit stiff right out of the box for a small number of runners

customer_reviews.title: Quite firm, narrow toebox, possibly best suited to a lighter runner.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, narrow toe box, wouldn't recommend for wide feet or those with a long second toe. Cushioning is much more firm than my previous Saucony Triumph Iso 2 shoes and am feeling that in my knees after my first long run, am hoping its just an adjustment thing otherwise will use for shorter runs only. Overall, probably best suited towards slimmer runners with fairly narrow toe area. That not a criticism, just a statement of opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RunForestRun

customer_reviews.title: Good for the road miles
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and very comfortable. They feel better than my previous pair of Gel Pulse 5 - not sure whether this is simply because they are newer or because of improvements to the product. I have been loyal to Asics and their Gel Pulse for about 10 years after reading an article where they were recommended for heavier runners who did their miles on hard surfaces. I would agree with this recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: BookBoy

customer_reviews.title: Greeting running trainers. Really supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Really supportive for running and feel much more sturdy than my last pair of New Balance. Fit was a bit tight for my actual size but next one up was worth it. For running, my feet sweat and swell which is normal, so ensure you get a size with enough room for this. Good price and service. Happy with these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lovely punchy electric orange
customer_reviews.text: Colour on these shoes is amazing, if you love punchy vibrant colours - as I do I am very happy about that. At first they were comfortable, very comfortable, but after a couple of months I am not so sure they are that comfortable anymore. Will need to start wearing insoles with these, something I hardly expect to do with Asics. That is the only reason why I am not giving these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, comfortable, fantastic for the average-joe weekend warrior
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a great runner, in my best moments I manage to run up to 6-7 km a couple of times a week, but it doesn't happen for more than a few months in a row. That said, with my feet (short and large), these are the only shoes that fit my foot and make me run for kms.
customer_reviews.author: Alias

customer_reviews.title: Very average shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had lots of asics in the past. Had the Pulse 7's before these and have to say that the quality and feel of the Pulse 7's was much better. There isn't enough cushioning. I have had about 6 pairs of asics and I have had a size 10 which fitted perfectly. Every other shoe from adult age has been a size 10. For some reason a size 10 in the Pulse 8 is too small and I required a 10.5. Asics need to up their game!
customer_reviews.author: C. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, still going strong after a year
customer_reviews.text: amazing trainers, still going strong in jan 2018. Still in good condition and comfortable. Used as main trainers for the past year, includes walking kids to school and back everyday. Brought for comfort rather than looks, they are very comfortable and I can recommend them and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: He is an 8 and size 8 fitted him perfect, he is out running in them 3 times ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He is an 8 and size 8 fitted him perfect, he is out running in them 3 times a week and has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product... but didnt last long!
customer_reviews.text: Great service..and product. Items arrived several days sooner than expected. Ordered half a size bigger as others on here recommended....perfect. Thanks. Trainers used less than a dozen times in 10 months...sole falling off and has had to be glued...thus I have knocked off 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. O. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and a snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very comfortable. Good cushioning so ideal for road running. I'm a size 9 so ordered a 9.5 and the fit is perfect, extremely comfortable with room for foot to swell due to heat, but they don't feel loose. Worth the money to reduce impact whilst road running.
customer_reviews.author: Mr James

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. I usually get the Gel Cumulus but ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. I usually get the Gel Cumulus but decided to try and save some cash and see if there was any real difference. So far, not done many miles on them but like them. Good cushioning and fit. I think getting two pairs for the price of the Cumulus is a benefit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Delacour

customer_reviews.title: Really good pair. Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair. Fit well. Good cushioning and not too heavy. Laces are a strange "spongy" type which takes getting used to when tying them. Really good for long runs. Water will get in if the puddles are more than 2cm.
customer_reviews.author: Chrism

customer_reviews.title: These trainers are very smart but sadly they are too narrow for a broad foot
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are very smart but sadly they are too narrow for a broad foot and so rather than struggle with shoes that hurt these guys simply took them back no questions allowing me to select another pair more suitable. GODD JOB.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for the regular runner
customer_reviews.text: These were a specifically requested gift for a friend of mine who runs almost daily at distances from a few kilometres to a marathon, and have been comfortable, light and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, really like to run in those
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, really like to run in those, unfortunately 1 size too small. And I had a pair of Asics as reference before. So that is a bummer. Used them shortly and sold them second hand (return ship to UK costs too much).
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's a shame amazon don't put VITAL information like
customer_reviews.text: £50 when i bought these. Same as my other pair. does the job with relative comfort FYI, for anyone that doesnt want to search the net. These are for neutral foot types. It's a shame amazon don't put VITAL information like that
customer_reviews.author: KD11

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first running shoes I’ve ever purchased. Hey fit great and are extremely comfortable and have provided the right support during marathon training and the marathon itself. Feel great on rough terrain too.
customer_reviews.author: MR B PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Love these trainers but order a size up as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers but order a size up as a 9 was like an 8 but reordered and they are great
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Daily training needs
customer_reviews.text: These shoes replaced my old Pulse gel 7. I am running long distances. I am using them for the day to day low millage training. I am satisfied with the performance. A con is the relatively low price
customer_reviews.author: Athanasios

customer_reviews.title: Good, stylish running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've given this four stars and not five as these pinch my wide feet a bit at the toes - but of course I'm being picky. These look great, perform well when I'm jogging and they arrived in a timely manner. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moviebuff67

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to replace his 20 year old white addidas trainers. It took some convincing but he loves these. He has worn them a lot for walking and they look as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ward

customer_reviews.title: An extremely comfortable and robust shoe
customer_reviews.text: An extremely comfortable and robust shoe. Great support. I've been wearing them for several months now and there are no rubbing points. The shoe has minimal movement on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for treadmill 10ks
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of Asics cumulus 16 size 12, so I knew what size would fit. Normally I would take a size 11 but with these shoes I knew it was best to go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: These are great Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Asics are generally always good and these don't disappoint, They're fantastic running trainers for my son, with good grip and foot support. He informed me that they were very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: New to Asics
customer_reviews.text: These are a great fitting shoe, I'm normally a U.K. 10wide, so I went up half a size just in case and I'm glad I did a 10 would of probably been a little snug on the toes. Otherwise lovely and comfortable and after years of wearing only Nike I'm already eying up another pair of Asics just for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: S.Foster

customer_reviews.title: Asics Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Asics can do no wrong. Even an older version of their Gel-Pulse. Is still good for running.
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: Great and small!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but order half a size bigger than your usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Bang Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoes, I liked them so much I got a 2nd pair
customer_reviews.author: C & J. De Ste Croix

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - I am glad that I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable - I am glad that I bought them. Travelled abroad on plane and wore them nearly every day. No pain.
customer_reviews.author: pastie057

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoes for money comfortable and well made. Go half size bigger the you get the perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Day

customer_reviews.title: ASICS trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Go a size up. Great for running indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuv

customer_reviews.title: Small fit
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, consider buying half/one size larger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios K.

customer_reviews.title: These are great comfortable shoes for an over pronating active kid
customer_reviews.text: These are great comfortable shoes for an over pronating active kid. However he only wore them for one week and the soles started to come apart. See pics. My Son is very hard wearing on shoes and goes through one pair every two months so I always have a back up. Hence missed the returns window. We always buy aside stability shoe but this quality was not usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back as they looked nothing like the picture they are very very bright orange!!
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and much cheaper than my similar previous shoes
customer_reviews.text: Review is in the title! And cheaper than the very same shoes at the local shoe shop! Very comfortable indeed
customer_reviews.author: warren harrison

customer_reviews.title: Next full size up
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews and the thing that popped out was to order a size up as they are a snug fit.as I am a size 9 I ordered a 9.5 and found they are still a snug fit and I would recommend is that you buy the next full size up, would I buy these again and the answer would have to yes but a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money, fits like a glove and cushion and support as expected with Asics
customer_reviews.author: Oggie1978

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a UK 10 1/2-11 but having tried the 11 in a store it was too small. I ordered the size 12 and it's a touch too big so will need to ad an insole, when ever I get around to it, but runs very well in the meantime. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Fiouse

customer_reviews.title: Sadly too small
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I had to return these trainers as they were much too small for me. Unfortunately the next size up was unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sports shoe, I did buy a half size larger, very good fit, good price, speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel good. Ordered half size bigger than I normally do and fit well
customer_reviews.author: Shan111

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Use them today for the first time on a mixture of road / trail and ran 8 miles without a problem
customer_reviews.author: steve abbott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes felt a little bit tight at first. My usual shoe size is 42 but I use larger running shoes, about 43 1⁄2. I got these shoes in size 43 1⁄2 and they felt a tad tight, but after a little bit of use they fit nicely. I would recommend getting a bit larger size than usual. Oh yeah, and the yellow colour is luminous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but a nice
customer_reviews.text: A lot more shocking orange than the picture, but a nice trainer
customer_reviews.author: william rae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I have had and I have had many brands !
customer_reviews.author: IAN HUTCHINSON

customer_reviews.title: Asics gel pulse 8
customer_reviews.text: I've only been running in these for 2 weeks but they are comfortable to,run in . I got them half a size bigger than my usual size which has has made them slightly too big but there is good cushioning and support in the trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of shoes that fit as expected and at the best price around
customer_reviews.author: D.J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good fit (same as shoe size) and comfortable to run in.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Middlehurst

customer_reviews.title: But half a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size bigger than usual based on other reviews. Glad I did, perfect fit. Good product, delivered fast
customer_reviews.author: MR L.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting, comfortable running shoes, feel like I can run all day
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable All-Rounder
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Hope they last longer than my last pair - uppers ripped after 4 months. I also change the insoles as the Asics insoles were riding after an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Still Game

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight running shoe with a good fit. Get a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: malcolm adams

customer_reviews.title: A slightly narrower trainer than the previous asic running shoes I have had so the tip in other reviews was most useful.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews suggested getting a size bigger and I have found this to be correct. A slightly narrower trainer than the previous asic running shoes I have had so the tip in other reviews was most useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. I bought the half size bigger as suggested by other purchasers, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had the gel pulse 6 version, so hoped these would be very similar and they were. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Storz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe, Asics doing the business again as always.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: It’s my fault the shoe size still I was open for an alternative which I never got. Maybe here customer service could go a bit further with options... I was caught already in the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FITTING
customer_reviews.text: JUST A LITTLE BIT TIGHT ON ONE FOOT BUT WILL STRETCH
customer_reviews.author: D. O.

customer_reviews.title: quality's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: quality's good for the price, size fits like a charm thanks to the help feature. hard to out five stars yet as I've obly had them for a couple of weeks and they haven't passed the test of time; the quality seems able to tho!
customer_reviews.author: Augustin Francois-Poncet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my Dad, can't get him out of them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warne

customer_reviews.title: Should have followed reviewer's advice. Go half a size ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have followed reviewer's advice. Go half a size larger than you normally wear. I'm 8 and now gone for 8.5..
customer_reviews.author: Alan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for anyone with low back/ankle/knee issues. supportive and firm with no comfort issues
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Top product.
customer_reviews.text: Used mainly for road walking and very comfy lightweight shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I have ever had. Amazing support and really comfortable. Great quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Total Scam
customer_reviews.text: Totally ripped off, these shoes were clearly used - there was mud around the sides and sellotape on the sole of one shoe. £85 for somebody's cast off? I don't think so!
customer_reviews.author: IAN N.

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good Asics shoe so far. Sole is slightly thicker than I expected. Size fits well. Cool colors.
customer_reviews.author: mtrojanuk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe too bad the size is a little big
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe too bad the size is a little big, I ordered the same size as my last asics shoe but apparently there's a difference..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Ran 8 miles and then 10 miles in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Ran 8 miles and then 10 miles in my first two runs with them and had no problems at all. Really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, good discount
customer_reviews.text: Very good sale price for this running out model. Arrived in a few days. Already using it almost every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 9, ordered the 9, they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: amazonner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable running shoes as expected with Asics. Shoes arrived on time. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Asics never let me down. Once again, very quality shoes for my 20k per week run.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Elena Cano Vargas

customer_reviews.title: More than pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Bought online, never tried Asics before... this was a purchase in hope. Really light, very comfortable - the half size gives them the width I need for my splodgy feet! Wore them around the house for a half day before running in them just to get them moulded to my feet - fantastic. I am over the moon with these. I was a runner for years, but years ago. I recently restarted and these will keep me on track to bring that PB down regularly. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. C. Abberley

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes - which i use for walking around the city in complete comfort... as close as it gets to walking on air. I followed others' advice by buying slightly larger than normal; i usually buy 10, but ordered a 10.5... a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: TfromLandN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a christmas present but have always been good value from previous buys
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Allcorn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit well. Nice for running etc as they keep your feet nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sizes very small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 12, ordered a 13, didn't fit. Sizes really tiny. Better off going to a shop and trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Clovis

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE
customer_reviews.text: First time buying from this supplier. Definitely not the size I ordered, tag does say US 9 which I have bought before many times from asics but actual shoe is not. It feels like a US 8
customer_reviews.author: james byrne

customer_reviews.title: gel pulse 7 and 8 user
customer_reviews.text: I already run in gel pulse 7 size 8 and I had to use a thinner insole for comfort. So the advice to me for my next pair was go a half size bigger.so I have gone for 8.5. I am still using my gel pulse 7 and find them fine for park runs to half marathons at my slow pace. I can see no reason for the gel pulse 8 to be any different I am hoping that the half size bigger allows me to use the supplied insole. If I was a fast runner I may have been looking for a lighter weight pair but I prefer comfort on distance runs.
customer_reviews.author: philip wood

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Pulse 8 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Ideal for neutral type runners, this shoe features a new upper to improve fit and style. The speva midsole continues to deliver excellent bounce back and responsiveness. Rearfoot and forefoot gel cushioning systems. Removable sockliner. Speva 45 lasting. Speva midsole material.
